Text: REJohn I havent received a call from Mark as of yet Do you have a list of interviewers in mind Thanks Johnny Original Message From Arnold John Sent Tuesday October AM To Palmer Johnny Subject FW Johnny Ill get Mark Findsen to call you Can you have at least trader interview him as well Thanks John Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Tuesday October AM To Arnold John Cc Palmer Johnny Subject RE Ill set it up as orig Johnny can you set this up Original Message From Arnold John Sent Monday October PM To Shankman Jeffrey A Nowlan Jr John L Subject Not so impressed with David goldman For a guy who has worked in derivatives for years couldnt answer some simple questions Very poor financial derivatives knowledge even though he worked at CRT for a long time and a Lyonnais for a while The only value I see in him is that he worked at BP for a while and might have some knowledge as to how they work

REConsider it done Thanks Johnny Original Message From Arnold John Sent Tuesday October AM To Palmer Johnny Subject FW Johnny Ill get Mark Findsen to call you Can you have at least trader interview him as well Thanks John Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Tuesday October AM To Arnold John Cc Palmer Johnny Subject RE Ill set it up as orig Johnny can you set this up Original Message From Arnold John Sent Monday October PM To Shankman Jeffrey A Nowlan Jr John L Subject Not so impressed with David goldman For a guy who has worked in derivatives for years couldnt answer some simple questions Very poor financial derivatives knowledge even though he worked at CRT for a long time and a Lyonnais for a while The only value I see in him is that he worked at BP for a while and might have some knowledge as to how they work

Marc FindsenJohn Ive spoken with Mark and I have received his resume Before I bring him in I just wanted to confirm that he is to interview with Crude and Products originators as well as one trader Please advise Thanks Johnny

RENo word from Mark yet Do you have a number for him Thanks Johnny Original Message From Arnold John Sent Tuesday October AM To Palmer Johnny Subject FW Johnny Ill get Mark Findsen to call you Can you have at least trader interview him as well Thanks John Original Message From Shankman Jeffrey A Sent Tuesday October AM To Arnold John Cc Palmer Johnny Subject RE Ill set it up as orig Johnny can you set this up Original Message From Arnold John Sent Monday October PM To Shankman Jeffrey A Nowlan Jr John L Subject Not so impressed with David goldman For a guy who has worked in derivatives for years couldnt answer some simple questions Very poor financial derivatives knowledge even though he worked at CRT for a long time and a Lyonnais for a while The only value I see in him is that he worked at BP for a while and might have some knowledge as to how they work

FW Final Schedule Thursday October Marc FindsenFyi Thanks Johnny Original Message From South Chad Sent Friday October AM To Delgado Lydia Palmer Johnny Subject RE Final Schedule Thursday October Marc Findsen Let me know if you have any questions Chad Original Message From Delgado Lydia Sent Wednesday October AM To Shankman Jeffrey A Arnold John Friedman Douglas S South Chad ONeal Timothy White Bill Cc Palmer Johnny Weatherford April Taylor Helen Marie Subject Final Schedule Thursday October Marc Findsen Importance High Attached please find the following documents File Marc Findsen Interview Scheduledoc File Evaluation Form Johnny Palmerxls File Marc Findsen resumedoc Thank you Lydia Delgado x

FW Mirant Trader Looking to move on Cc JuanDon Please advise your interest Thanks Johnny Original Message From mailto Sent Saturday September PM To Palmer Johnny Subject Mirant Trader Looking to move on Johnny Please let me know if you could use a west trader perhaps on the forward side of the market This applicant has been trading next day and wants to move to the forward side Regards Craig Jefferies President CKB Energy Inc

FW I am still very interested in this positionDonJuan Fyi Thanks Johnny Original Message From Brown Dennis Sent Monday October AM To Palmer Johnny Subject RE I am still very interested in this position Thanks again Johnny Dennis From Johnny nronXgate on AM To Dennis ES cc Subject RE I am still very interested in this position Dennis Update your resume to reflect that you have completed Derivatives II and forward it to my attention I will then forward it the the hiring managers Thanks Johnny Original Message From Brown Dennis Sent Friday October PM To Palmer Johnny Subject I am still very interested in this position Johnny We met in Derivative I training I have recently completed Derivatives II I think that I would be an excellent candidate for this position I have the educational requirement a modest but broad level of exposure to the power industry and our products excellent communication skills very strong spreadsheet skills I do not mind shift work and above all a strong desire to learn trading I would like to meet or discuss anytime at your convenience Dennis Brown ext POWER TRADER HRREALTIME ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS Involved in trading of energy specifically power Identify and evaluate current power market needs supply availability and new market opportunities Ability to perform shiftwork ampm or pmam Excellent phone skills Strong desire to learn trading ESSENTIAL REQUIREMENTS Advanced Excel spreadsheet skills Bachelors degree preferably in a financial or economic discipline Trading experience is a plus Knowledge of Risk Management tools Knowledge of trading products regional forward price curves risk management pricing strategies power supply and transmissionphysical assets to executefacilitate transactions Knowledge of regions in which power is traded SERC ECAR PJM MAIN NY Power Pool PREFERRED SKILLS NA SPECIAL CHARACTERISTICS NA CONTACT NA Job ID Department ENA NORTHEAST REGION TRAD Company WHOLESALE RETAIL COMM NORTH AMERICA Location HOUSTON TX Type Pay na FLSA class Manager DAVISMARK Recruiter JPALMER

RE REVISED Final Schedule Thursday October Bang I TranPlease provide feedback with regards to Bang Thanks Johnny Original Message From Delgado Lydia Sent Wednesday October AM To Baughman Jr Don Hernandez Juan Garcia Miguel L Laurent Dean Cc Palmer Johnny Weatherford April Subject REVISED Final Schedule Thursday October Bang I Tran Importance High Attached please find the following documents File Bang I Tran Interview Scheduledoc File Evaluation Form Johnny Palmerxls File Bang I Tran resumedoc Thank you Lydia Delgado x

RE Final Schedule Friday August Mark J PottsDonJuan Any interest in Mark Potts Thanks Johnny Original Message From Delgado Lydia Sent Tuesday July PM To Baughman Jr Don Hernandez Juan Cc Palmer Johnny Arguijo Cheryl Subject Final Schedule Friday August Mark J Potts Importance High Attached please find the following documents File Mark J Potts Interview Scheduledoc File Evaluation Form Johnny Palmerxls File Mark J Potts resumedoc Thanks Lydia x

FW Job Opportunities in ENA Cc JuanDon Fyi Please advise of your interest Thanks Johnny Original Message From Alviar Hector Sent Wednesday August PM To Palmer Johnny Subject Job Opportunities in ENA Dear Johnny Palmer I heard about openings in the ENA power trading team employing hour shifts If there are job opportunities for a person of my caliber I hope we can meet After graduating from Rice University and finishing my graduate degree in University of Texas business school I worked for Enron for years in EBS and Corporate For more background please look at my resume and let me know if you are interested in having a brief interview with me Sincerely Hector M Alviar Enron Broadband Services Global Bandwidth Risk Management EB D

RE Make job offer to James Vasquez Cc On it Original Message From Hernandez Juan Sent Tuesday August PM To Palmer Johnny Cc Baughman Jr Don Subject Make job offer to James Vasquez Johnny Don and I have interviewed James and he looks like a very good fit for us at this time Can we get the paper work started on making an offer Original Message From Baughman Jr Don Sent Thursday August PM To Palmer Johnny Cc Hernandez Juan Will Lloyd Subject Bring James Vasquez to Houston for Interview Johnny I would like to bring James down for an interview for a Realtime Power Trader position Give me a call if you have any questions Thanks Don Baughman xt Resumedoc File Resumedoc

FW internal candidate for DonJuan Please advise of your interest in Jacksons experience Thanks Johnny Original Message From Hull James Sent Tuesday September PM To Palmer Johnny Subject internal candidate for Johnny Internal candidate Trey Jackson Logan applied for your job and inquired with me about status Are you considering him Thanks James Jackson Davis Logan III Pickens Houston TX hm wk OBJECTIVE To obtain an assistant trader or analysis position in a trading environment which provides a challenging opportunity for growth EXPERIENCE Bridgeline Holdings LLC Bridgeline Gas Marketing Lead of Risk Management Houston TX November Current Bridgeline Holdings is a joint venture between Enron Corporation and the Texaco Corporation Served as the head of the risk management group for Bridgeline Holdings LLC Obtained valuable experience working in a start up environment Worked in close conjunction with upper management and accounting department heads in order to reconcile the mark to market daily trading profit and loss statements to the monthly corporate income statement and balance sheets Trained and managed a new risk employee Performed daily risk functions including researching trends as well as many ad hoc request the traders might of needed Gained technical experience working with the LIM database Enron North America Enron Networks Gas Risk Management Specialist Houston TX August November Responsible for the reporting the daily profit and loss statement as well as the trading positions to the trader Gained an excellent understanding of risk and structuring Worked extensively with options derivatives swaps and transport Obtained a working knowledge of Visual Basis macros and Access databases Completed three derivatives courses Trained several new risk employees Helped leads define and streamline risk processes such as the consolidation of the positions and profit and loss statements that are reported upper management Involved in the testing of EnronOnline systems TDS systems TransCanada Energy Natural Gas Group Book Analyst Houston TX May August Responsible for tracking all physical and financial positions analyzing which portions of the current position are at risk through a mark to market MS Access database While doing such gained an excellent understanding of price exposure and risk This also provided the opportunity to learn the physical aspect of Natural Gas trading as well as learning how to hedge the physical with financial instruments such as swaps and derivatives Served as the back up for nominations on the Texas Gas Pipeline and the ANR Pipeline Worked closely with the accounting department to reconcile the trades imbalances and invoicing JP Morgan Securities Inc Municipal Bond Department Intern New York NY Summer Developed analytical interpersonal and teamwork abilities while conducting various modeling and research projects including industry specific and general analyses for the Structured Products and Tax Exempt groups Actively participated in all facets of fixed income trading and sales Presented bids for competitive bond deals for the Underwriting desk Responsible for maintaining the Bond Buyer Index an important tool used by traders to value proprietary positions in the market EDUCATION The University of Texas at Austin Bachelor of Arts History minor in the Business Foundations Program May SKILLS Computer Proficient in MS Excel MS Access LIM database CQG
Jason Berlin Cc JuanDon Ive spoken with Jason and have confirmed October th as a start date Im working with legal on his day noncompetition agreement Thanks Johnny

FW Resume for Job Posting DonJuan Jackson is interested in your position Please advise of your interest Thanks Johnny Original Message From Logan III Jackson Sent Wednesday September AM To Palmer Johnny Subject Resume for Job Posting Dear Mr Palmer Please find my attached resume I am very interested in interviewing for the Realtime Power position I am currently and Enron employee that has been working at Enron for two years in Natural Gas Risk Management In addition to this resume I will fill out the form on the job posting itself I look forward to hearing from you in the future Thank you Jackson Davis Logan III

FW Hourly Trading Desk Cc Please advise of your interest in Andrews experience Thanks Johnny Original Message From Greer Andrew Sent Monday April PM To Palmer Johnny Subject Hourly Trading Desk Johnny Thank you for your prompt response to my phone call this morning Attached is a resume and cover letter for your review If you recall from our conversation Friday I was visiting with Tony Vasut about positions on your power trading desk as an hourly trader The power desk is something I have been interested in learning more about for several months When you informed me of the current opportunities as an hourly power trader I was extremely interested I would love to meet with you or anyone from the desk at your convenience to discuss the opportunities in detail Please feel free to call at X or reply to this email Thank you again for your time Sincerely Andrew Greer

Alexander McElreath hr Trader Cc Please advise of your interest in Alexs experience He has years experience trading in the real time power markets He currently trades the ERCOT and WSCC regions for the TexasNew Mexico Power Company Alex resumedoc
Garvin Brown AXIA Sr Power Scheduler Cc me of your interest in Garvins experience Thanks Johnny

FW Power trading PST DonJuan Dennis is very interested in opportunities on your desk He is open to working the evening shift Please advise of your interest Thanks Johnny Original Message From Brown Dennis Sent Friday August AM To Palmer Johnny Subject Power trading Johnny We met briefly in derivatives training I currently work in large bundled structuring providing a due diligence function I am customer interfacing and give assurance on data that I collect and distribute to the various groups that determine the structure execute pricing and even setup invoicing I have a strong energy knowledge and excellent customer service background I would very much like to discuss opportunities Dennis Brown ext

Mason Hamlin Interview Cc PST Please confirm your availability to interview Mason for a Real Time trading position on our E Power hour desk Wednesday June th Don Baughman Juan Hernandez Kayne Coulter John Forney Thanks Johnny

Ryan Thomas Interview Cc PST Ryan Thomas will be in our office tomorrow morning to interview for a Real Time trading position on our E Power hour desk Please confirm your availability to interview Ryan Don Baughman Juan Hernandez Kayne Coulter John Forney Thanks Johnny

FW Your OfferPST Fyi Thanks Johnny Original Message From Michael Byrne ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESMichaelByrneCMichaelBacespowerEcomE NRONcom Sent Monday June PM To Kevin Presto Email Palmer Johnny Subject FW Your Offer John and Kevin In response to your counter offer of plus signing I must admit it just makes it where I have to be money wise And ENRON is very tempting to go work for but I have to decline for now There are things here in the works at ACES I am not at liberty to discuss right now that make it hard for me to leave for the summer months I have been promised a lot of things recently some before our interview and more since then that would make my jumping ship a little premature By the way ACES does not know about my interviewing with you and I perfer keeping it that way If ACES does not deliver on what was promised then I will be calling you again I will keep the paper work just in case and regardless of that thank you for the interview it was a great experience Michael Byrne Original Message From Michael Byrne Sent Thursday June PM To Johnny Palmer Email Cc Kevin Presto Email Subject Your Offer John and Kevin I have carefully reviewed your offer and worked the numbers several times to compare ENRON and ACES With my raise my salary and annual bonus is raised to a point that makes your offer just not quite enough Add in the cost of living increase for Houston and I would be behind the curve I have worked the numbers and in order to be fair I would need in base salary along with the signing bonus as well as at least months severance pay in case things do not work out I mention this because the annual bonus is subjective and may or may not happen If you feel that this is excessive I understand I will be worth the extra money especially after this summer I will be learning to trade PJM NYPP and MAAC I will also have the opportunity to deal more with SERC and FRCC as well I am willing to consider your reply to this and will be able for discussion tomorrow evening I will mail back this counter offer as well Thank you for the opportunity and I look forward to speaking with you soon Michael J Byrne ACES Power Marketing

RE Christine Walton ResumePST Don Not any fits that Im aware of however I will distribute among the recruiters Thanks Johnny Original Message From Baughman Jr Don Sent Tuesday October PM To Palmer Johnny Subject FW Christine Walton Resume Johnny Would you please take a look at Christines resume and see if she fits any personnel needs in the company Thanks Don Christine Walton Resumedoc File Christine Walton Resumedoc

FW Your OfferPST DonLloyd Fyi Please advise Thanks Johnny Original Message From Michael Byrne ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESMichaelByrneCMichaelBacespowerEcomE NRONcom Sent Thursday June PM To Palmer Johnny Cc Kevin Presto Email Subject Your Offer John and Kevin I have carefully reviewed your offer and worked the numbers several times to compare ENRON and ACES With my raise my salary and annual bonus is raised to a point that makes your offer just not quite enough Add in the cost of living increase for Houston and I would be behind the curve I have worked the numbers and in order to be fair I would need in base salary along with the signing bonus as well as at least months severance pay in case things do not work out I mention this because the annual bonus is subjective and may or may not happen If you feel that this is excessive I understand I will be worth the extra money especially after this summer I will be learning to trade PJM NYPP and MAAC I will also have the opportunity to deal more with SERC and FRCC as well I am willing to consider your reply to this and will be able for discussion tomorrow evening I will mail back this counter offer as well Thank you for the opportunity and I look forward to speaking with you soon Michael J Byrne ACES Power Marketing

FW Bassett ResumePST Don Please advise of your interest in Jeffs experience Thanks Johnny Original Message From WeinbergerPaul Sent Friday June AM To Palmer Johnny Subject FW Bassett Resume Original Message From Jeffrey Bassett ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESJeffreyBassettCfastrunmsnEcomE NRONcom Sent Thursday May PM To WeinbergerPaul Subject Bassett Resume Paul I enjoyed talking with you today about opportuniites within Enron I am not disappointed with Shell Energy but I really want to get back into wholesale trading of Power Attached is a copy of my current resume My resume does not reflect the short contract consulting position that I held with NucleusCaminus I look forward to further discussions concerning employment opportunities I can be reached by phone at Home Work Thankyou for your time Jeffrey A Bassett Jeffrey Adoc

FW Trading Positions at EnronDon Please advise me of your interest in Jeffs experience Thanks Johnny Original Message From Pena Jeff Sent Thursday May AM To Palmer Johnny Subject RE Trading Positions at Enron Johnny I have attached my resume I wanted to add to it the Risk Assessment and Control RAC application projects that I have directly worked on that have exposed me to the RAC side of the business I am not sure if it was relevant however I felt it was an important part of my motivation and interest on the trading side of Enrons business in addition to my own career objectives Though I recognize I have no trading experience I am seriously interested in moving in this direction Please let me know if you need any more information Thank you Jeff Pena Original Message From Palmer Johnny Sent Thursday May AM To Pena Jeff Subject RE Trading Positions at Enron Jeff Send me your resume and Ill determine if there is a fit Thanks Johnny Original Message From Pena Jeff Sent Thursday May AM To Palmer Johnny Subject Trading Positions at Enron Johnny I wanted to know if you might be able to share with me a little more info on the trading positions you have available The questions I have are Is there a job req on the Working Enron website that would have a good job description of the available positions If not what are the requirements for the position Experience required Please feel free to contanct me at your earliest convenience Thanks Jeff Pea ENW IntranetExtranet Development
